#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		unsigned long long  n,temp,sum=0;
		cin>>n;
		temp=n;
		while(temp!=0)
		{
		   unsigned long long x=temp%10;
		   switch(x)
		   {
		   	case 0: sum+=18;break;
		   	case 1: sum+=4;break;
		   	case 2: sum+=10;break;
		   	case 3: sum+=10;break;
		   	case 4: sum+=8;break;
		   	case 5: sum+=10;break;
		   	case 6: sum+=18;break;
		   	case 7: sum+=9;break;
		   	case 8: sum+=21;break;
		   	case 9: sum+=18;break;
		   	
		   }
		   temp=temp/10;
		}
		cout<<sum<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
